abstract: Representatives from Wall Street, including Vikram Pandit of Citigroup and Leon Black of Apollo Global Management, are planning to attend what has become a West Coast Davos.
snippet: Representatives from Wall Street, including Vikram Pandit of Citigroup and Leon Black of Apollo Global Management, are planning to attend what has become a West Coast Davos.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — The first rule of the Milken Conference is: Don’t call it the Milken Conference.

headline.main: Milken Conference Kicks Off With Panel on Global Growth
